page.title: 06...LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Three police stations cover our area. Stechford and Bromford are open 24hrs. daily.Shard End Station is only open from 7a.m.-11p.m. Bromford and Stechford are modern stations built in the 1970's. Each has its own computer from which information can be obtained straight away. All stations have cells to detain people charged with a crime. Over 30 crimes are reported each day at Bromford.The most frequent crime being house-breaking. Different types of policemen are based at Bromford and Stechford eg.C.I.D.,Beat and Traffic Patrol.Stechford also has Dog-Handlers. There are a number of vehicles working from Bromford and Stechford eg.Zulu Cars for traffic work and Panda Cars & motor bikes for beat work. Each police- man has a radio to keep in touch with the station. About 35% of reported crimes are solved.
